page.title: 01Landscove Review
page.content: The major occupation in this block is{Farming}.There are a number of farms and hamlets surrounded by farmland .The small hills here are topped with small copses often hiding some the very irregular quarrying of former years. All the other land that is not residential is cultivated .There are four {plantations }in this block,but the rest of the land supports livestock and {agricultural } pursuits.The other major concerns include an agricultural hirer at Bickaton and {pig}farm at Beara producing a thousand plus carcases a year. The social centres are at Woolston Green and Woodland,the Victory Hall ,Landscove being the venue for various functions.Large pylons are visible from most places in this block.
